Full terms and conditions are available under “Important Information” on this page.  Could this be what you've been looking for?  A 2016 Mazda Premacy  with WOF until 18/10/2025 and registration until 04/12/2025.  This imported Wagon has done 103,086 Kms and has had 1 owner.  Time for a new taxi? This spacious 7-seater will fit all the kids, with a bit of room in the back too.  Don't overheat in the summer. This Premacy is equipped with air conditioning.  Fresh back from servicing, this Mazda is ready to hit the road and isn't due for servicing until it hits 113,000 km Kms.  No need to worry about expensive cambelt jobs as this Mazda is running a timing chain.  Built with your safety in mind, this Premacy has ABS which will assist your braking in the wet.  Got a young one in the back? This Premacy will make your life easy, and help keep them safe with the addition of child seat anchor points.  Stop fumbling around trying to get into your car. Say goodbye to scratched up drivers door handles. This Mazda comes with remote locking.  With a reverse camera on the rear you'll back into parking spots with ease in this Wagon.  Keep your hands on the wheel at all times. This Mazda has controls on the steering wheel for your safety, and convenience. A 2016 Holden Captiva 7 LTZ with WOF until 06/11/2025 and registration until 29/06/2025.  This New Zealand new SUV has done 136,239 Kms and has had 5 owners.  After a bit of traction? This Captiva 7 is the 4WD model.  Time for a new taxi? This spacious 7-seater will fit all the kids, with a bit of room in the back too.  Dual zone air conditioning means you and your passengers can set your ideal conditions for maximum cruising comfort in this Captiva 7.  Don't worry about losing those pesky hub caps. This Holden has alloy wheels fitted.  Can't fit it all in the car? Don't worry about it. This SUV has roof racks fitted and is ready to head out to the surf, snow or wherever you want to go.  Fresh back from servicing, this Holden is ready to hit the road and isn't due for servicing until it hits 146000 Kms.  No need to worry about expensive cambelt jobs as this Holden is running a timing chain.  Built with your safety in mind, this Captiva 7 has ABS which will assist your braking in the wet.  No chance of missing anything in those pesky blind spots - blind spot alert makes changing lanes easy.  This one is a safe investment for sure. Your new Captiva 7 comes with an alarm.  Pair your device to this Holden using Bluetooth, put some tunes on and sing along. Just make sure the windows are up…  Like to sit back and relax on those long journeys? Cruise control has you covered in this Holden.  Stop fumbling around trying to get into your car. Say goodbye to scratched up drivers door handles. This Holden comes with remote locking.  Reversing camera and parking sensors make parking this SUV a breeze.  Keep your hands on the wheel at all times. This Holden has controls on the steering wheel for your safety, and convenience.  Plug into the USB port in this Captiva 7, and listen to what you want (too bad if the back seat drivers don't like it).
